quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Beaver and Kotter
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, baby-sat, neighborhood. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In the popular sitcom Leave It to Beaver, Mary Ellens father was a teacher at the high school.
Marcia Strassman, the actress who played Mrs. Kotter on the show Welcome Back, Kotter was born in what city?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: New York City

questions.question: There were two old firemen in the series Leave It to Beaver that Beaver used to visit. What were their names?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gus and Charlie

questions.question: What was the name of Mr. Kotters wife on the show Welcome Back, Kotter?
What were the names of Eddie Haskels parents in the series Leave It to Beaver?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: George and Alice

questions.question: Wally and Beaver, the two brothers on the show Leave It to Beaver, spent their train money on hot dogs and stuff and couldnt pay for the train ride home from their aunts house. Where did they tell the conductor she lived?

options.text: In an apartment in the city

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: In a poor house

questions.question: In the TV series Welcome Back, Kotter, Sweathogs was the name given to the students in Mr. Kotters class.
On the show Leave It to Beaver, Beaver and Larry performed a magic trick on Benji, the little boy who lived down the street. They made Benji think they had turned Beaver into what?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A rock

questions.question: Beaver and Wally from Leave It to Beaver baby-sat for a little girl who kept telling them she wanted to see Mary-Jane. What was Mary Jane?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The bathroom

questions.question: The Cleavers from Leave It to Beaver lived in what city?
The show Welcome Back, Kotter ran from 1973 - 1977.
What did Eddie Haskel from Leave It to Beaver buy for himself with his service station credit card?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A vest

questions.question: On the show Leave It to Beaver, there was a haunted house in the neighborhood. What did Beaver do for the lady who lived in it?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Walked her dog

questions.question: One night Larry Mondello, a character from Leave It to Beaver, got sick when he stayed at Beavers house. What was the reason for this?

options.text: He ate too much ice cream
He ate too many candy bars

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He ate too many candy bars

questions.question: In the TV series Leave It to Beaver, Wally took Julie Foster to which expensive restaurant?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The White Fox
